ingredients.ingredient: 1 large Vidalia or sweet onion, peeled and cut into large wedges
1 pinch garlic salt and pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic salt and pepper to taste

cookingTips: Wrap onions in foil packets with butter to trap steam and heat evenly
Grill over medium heat for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally
Pierce foil carefully to release hot steam
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you achieve caramelization on a grill while keeping the onions tender?
